EmailTemplate.subject: Let’s Take It To The Next Level
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hi, {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} Do you want to improve your flight planning by partnering with Honeywell Aerospace <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-planning?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirectflight_bga&utm_term=email8]]>? We know you’ve always wanted a flight planning platform that’s flexible, efficient and easy to use. GoDirect Flight Planning lets you view all available routes and create, optimize and file your best flight plan in just minutes. How does your calendar look this week to jump on a quick call to discuss? Best wishes,
Regina Warnke Specialist - Inside Sales GoDirect Mobile: (319) 573-9710 Email: regina.warnke@honeywell.com <[[mailto:regina.warnke@honeywell.com]]> GoDirectSales@honeywell.com <[[mailto:GoDirectSales@honeywell.com]]>
